description: With the big time jump taking place in Hulu's King of the Hill revival, the beloved animated sitcom finally has an opportunity to address its greatest sin.

description: Cory Michael Smith, Steve Carell, Jason Schwartzman, and Ramy Youssef break down Jesse Armstrong’s new HBO Movie Mountainhead
title: Mountainhead Actor Cory Michael Smith on How His Character is Like The Riddler

description: The Phillipou Bros. have returned with the horror movie Bring Her Back. Here's everything you need to know about the movie's twisted ending.

author: Matt Kim
description: As we celebrate the end of AANHPI month, we look back on the legendary Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon 25 years after its release.
title: 25 Years After Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon the Work for AANPHI in Cinema Continues

author: Michael Cripe
description: Roblox farming simulator Grow a Garden is eclipsing active player numbers achieved by some of the most popular games on across PC, mobile, and console – so what exactly is it?
title: Roblox's Grow a Garden Towers Above Even the Biggest Steam Games — but You Probably Have No Idea What It Is

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Today, over 300 unionized quality assurance workers at ZeniMax Media, who work on everything from The Elder Scrolls to Doom, have announced they have reached a tentative deal with parent company Microsoft on their first contract since forming their union two years ago.
title: The Elder Scrolls, Fallout, Doom QA Workers Union Reaches Tentative Contract With Microsoft After Nearly Two Years

author: Lindsey Salzer
description: We asked the AANHPI community on staff what their favorite movies and TV shows to watch are, with Asian American and Native Hawaiian/Pacific Islander voices in mind. So, in no particular order, here are some of our favorites available to stream in the U.S. right now.
title: Where to Watch IGN's Favorite AANHPI Shows and Movies Currently Streaming

author: Lex Briscuso
title: The Internet Reacts to Sydney Sweeney Selling Her Bathwater: 'That's Disgusting! Where?'

author: Michael Cripe
description: Mike Judge and Greg Daniels’ King of the Hill revival series has cracked open a first look at its new time-lapse intro, along with a Hulu and Disney+ release date of August 4.
title: King of the Hill Revival Series Sets August Release Date With First Look at an Older Bobby, Hank, and Peggy

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: In The Fantastic Four: First Steps we’ll no doubt get to see Mr. Fantastic, Invisible Woman, Human Torch, and The Thing show off their powers as they battle to defend Earth against the might of Galactus. But could we also see Franklin Richards get in on the action, too?
title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps Actor Vanessa Kirby Issues Franklin Richards Tease: ‘It's Not Just Adults That Have Superpowers'

author: Vikki Blake
description: Ubisoft's heading into the weekend dropping a big tease about Splinter Cell. But what does it mean?
title: Ubisoft Just Dropped An Image of Splinter Cell Star Sam Fisher With No Context — What Does it Mean?

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Elden Ring Nightreign is out, and players are already diving into the shifting lands to fight the Nightlord. If they warmed up a bit on the original Elden Ring, though, they might be finding themselves a little turned around by some control changes.
title: Some Elden Ring Nightreign Players Are Fighting Their Muscle Memory From the Original Elden Ring's Controls and Chugging Flasks by Mistake

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 30, Pokémon TCG Destined Rivals singles are crashing fast, with prices dropping by 50% on TCG Player. Plus, SteelSeries gaming gear is on sale at Amazon, and more.
title: The Best Deals Today: Pokémon TCG: Destined Rivals Crashes and More

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Officially, we don't know if there's going to be a remake of Persona 4. But if there was such a thing, we know now at least three of the original voice actors aren't coming back for it.
title: Two More Persona 4 Actors Have Said They're Not Returning for an Unannounced Persona 4 Remake

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Serenity is getting a 20th Anniversary Limited Edition 4K Steelbook that's set to release this year on July 22.
title: Serenity Is Getting a 20th Anniversary 4K Steelbook That’s Now Available To Preorder

author: Vikki Blake
description: MultiVersus, the 2024 free-to-play crossover fighting game, will shortly go offline for good, and fans are saying their goodbyes.
title: MultiVersus Players Say Goodbye: 'This Game Will Always Hold a Special Place in My Heart'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Elden Ring Nightreign sold an impressive 2 million copies on its first day.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Sells 2 Million Units on the First Day

author: Lex Briscuso
description: If you’re a Keanu Reeves fan, you’ll be happy to know a sequel to his hit film Constantine has been in the works for some time — but recently, one of Reeves’ co-stars from the original film revealed that the actor isn’t too thrilled with the scripts that have come about during the development process.
title: Keanu Reeves Isn't 'Happy' With the Constantine 2 Scripts in Development, Co-Star Claims: 'Don't Turn It Into Big Marvel'

author: Eric Van Allen
description: One should really never the doubt the tenacity of modders. Elden Ring Nightreign is now live, and within 24 hours of its launch, one well-known FromSoftware game modder has already demonstrated a Duos mode mod.
title: One Modder Has Already Demonstrated an Elden Ring Nightreign Duos Mod

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: With the launch of Call of Duty Season 4, Activision quietly put adverts inside loadouts for Black Ops 6 and Warzone, sparking a backlash in the process.
title: Activision Quietly Force Adverts into Call of Duty Black Ops 6 and Warzone Loadouts and Players Absolutely Hate It: 'At This Point It Really Feels Like Opening Up a Mobile Game'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It’s early days for Elden Ring Nightreign, but already developer FromSoftware has announced a patch that will make solo play easier. Check out early patch notes for update 1.02.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign Developer FromSoftware Already Has a Patch in the Works to Make the Brutally Difficult Solo Play Easier

author: Vikki Blake
description: Microsoft has reportedly pulled back on developing its own Xbox handheld console.
title: Microsoft Reportedly Pulls Back Development on Its Own Xbox Handheld to Focus on Third-Party Devices

author: Scott Collura
description: Director Danny Boyle is using every trick in the book to maintain a unique, if expanded, feel to the return of the infected in 28 Years Later.
title: 28 Years Later Director Danny Boyle Goes Big With the Horror Sequel: 'If You're Widescreen, the Infected Could Be Anywhere'

author: Amelia Emberwing
description: Lilo & Stitch smashed its way into theaters last weekend, but the film was met by a huge amount of backlash from fans over changes to its ending. The ending isn't inherently bad, though. It's everything that leads up to it that causes the problem.
title: The Live-Action Lilo & Stitch Has Issues That Extend Far Beyond Its Controversial Ending

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Helldivers 2’s ongoing Galactic War appears to have reached another turning point, with the Federation declaring victory over the Illuminate. But what's really going on?
title: Helldivers 2 Declares Victory: 'The Battle of Super Earth Is Won' — What Next for the Illuminate?

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Witcher 3 is getting one more patch later in 2025, bringing cross-platform mod support to the game and making mods available on consoles for the very first time.
title: The Witcher 3 Is Getting One More Patch Later in 2025, Adding Mods on Consoles for the First Time

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: It’s early days for Elden Ring Nightreign, but already players have run up against their toughest challenge so far. No, it's not a classic FromSoftware boss, it’s the struggle to find friends to play with.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign's Toughest Challenge So Far? Finding Friends to Play With

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: After playing several hours of the opening of Hell is Us along with some mid-game dungeon crawling, we found it to be a game that, so far, makes charting out into a familiar yet deeply alien world feel captivating.
title: Hell is Us Brings a 'New-Weird' Approach to the Sci-Fi Action-RPG

author: Vikki Blake
description: A commemorative plaque celebrating the release of Sony's beleaguered shooter Concord is up for auction on a goodwill online store with bids of over $3,000.
title: Someone Donated This Concord Commemorative Plaque To Goodwill — And It's Now Asking for over $3,000

author: Vikki Blake
description: There's been a lot of scuttlebutt about the arrival of Abby in The Last of Us Season 2, but I don't think any of us were talking about actor Kaitlyn Dever getting her face CGI'ed due to a (shudder) spider bite.
title: The Last of Us Had to Use CGI on Abby Actor Kaitlyn Dever — Here's Why

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: This week, Capcom released a detailed analysis of Monster Hunter Wilds’ play data. Bearing the official-sounding name of “The Forbidden Lands White Paper 1,” the Japanese-language report covers player activities after MHW’s April 4 update, and reveals that Hunters have very strong preferences when it comes to the in-game food.
title: Monster Hunter Wilds Official Report Reveals Players' Favorite Foods From the Forbidden Lands

author: Vikki Blake
description: Atomic Heart has hit 10 million players, two years after its 2023 release.
title: Atomic Heart Celebrates 10 Million Players And Confirms One More DLC Is In the Works

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Elden Ring Nightreign has enjoyed a massive launch on Steam, but the excitement was tarnished by a ‘mixed’ user review rating, with players complaining about a lack of duos co-op and voice chat.
title: Elden Ring Nightreign’s Massive Steam Launch Tarnished by 'Mixed' User Reviews Over Lack of Duos Co-Op, Voice Chat

author: Jordan Sirani
description: Looking to go on a Mission Impossible binge? We've got you covered with a chronological list of all seven movies.
title: How to Watch Mission Impossible Movies in Chronological Order

description: Another Friday, another fresh drop of game deal delights, and this one's stacked with hefty discounts and fascinating gems.
title: AU Deals: Score Tiny Tina's and Limbo For Nada, Amazon Finally Offers Switch 2 Consoles, and More!

description: Prices likely won't go down for the foreseeable future.
title: The Biggest Gaming Accessory Brands That May Be Impacted By Tariffs in 2025 and Beyond
